sentences.sentence: I think people just get frustrated without how harsh life can be, so they're spending their time dwelling on that frustration – we calling it anger – keeping their eyes shut to the wholeness of the situation, to all those little, tinny things that have come together to make it.
sentences.translation: 我想，人们在不知生活会有多困苦时就感到失败，所以人们便久久围困于自己的失败中，我们称之为愤怒——对这一局面的整体视而不见，也对那些造成这种局面的各种细小的、琐碎的细节视而不见。

sentences.sentence: Marriage is not a ritual or an end. It is a long, intricate, intimate dance together and nothing matters more than your own sense of balance and your choice of partner.
sentences.translation: 婚姻不是仪式也不是终结，而是一支漫长、复杂、亲密的共舞。最重要的是你自己的平衡感和对舞伴的选择。

sentences.sentence: Only those that risk going too far can possibly know how far they can go.
sentences.translation: 只有勇于承担风险，敢于走出去的人，才会明白他们到底能走多远。
选择你的未来。选择你自己的人生。

sentences.sentence: Even the failure to do something is in itself a deed.
sentences.translation: 即使做某件事没有成功，失败本身也是功绩。
